description_en: The Timeline Bar shows the currently active timeline . Through this control you can add and remove instances and other types of tracks to a timeline, and edit its properties. Using the Timeline Bar Here's a summary of how to use the Timeline Bar. A project can have multiple timelines, each timeline can have multiple instances, and each instance can have multiple property tracks. Tracks then use keyframes to mark points in a timeline.
